title: Traiteur O'pono pono
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Indian, International, Italian, Organic, Raw, Mediterranean, Salad bar, Juice bar, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Asian, Bakery, Catering, Fusion
description: A vegetarian/organic take-away place with some vegan meals. Gluten free and raw available. Fresh juices and smoothies with superfoods are offered. Just a 1-minute walk from the train station, in the heart of the city. Free delivery for lunch. Also for dinner and reception on request.
